text.data: Matelite: Bah...[end]
Taicho: [character][0x1], do not get angry when you hear what the queen has to say.[end]
[character][0x1]: Sorry, [character][0x1]. Let us be alone for now.[end]
I know that what we did was not a mistake... [character][0x1]... Don't be disappointed... That's it! At a time like this we need some recreation![end]
Sendak: [character][0x1]! There is a place in town where we can have a drink. I shall be waiting for you there![end]

The queen went into the underground prison in order to protect Campbell.
She did so to show that she does not resist Sauzer.[end]
Campbell didn't want to be liberated... Now Emperor Sauzer will be angry...[end]
Grrrr...[end]

Might the Granbelos Empire come back to Campbell?
I think so. No, they won't.[end1]
Of course! They'll come back in much greater numbers![end]
That's good to hear.[end]
If we were obedient the Imperial soldiers were actually nice guys...[end]
We welcome you![end]
Queen Campbell: I have nothing more to say to you![end]
Queen Campbell: You... you're [character][0x1], aren't you?[end]
Queen Campbell: Please... Don't watch out for us.[end]
Queen Campbell: Do you still intend to start wars? All the wars ended when Sauzer took control of the world...[end]
[character][0x1]: Aunt...[end]
Sendak: Princess... about the legend...[end]
[character][0x1]: I know, Sendak.[end]
Queen Campbell: Sauzer's desire is to unite the world. He has done that. That is why we cannot resist him... If we obey him we are still free.[end]

Queen Campbell: You certainly can't call it true peace. But, I...
No, what can you do about it?[end]

Queen Campbell: The Empire might come back to retake control of Campbell.
If that happens, will you protect Campbell? Can you do that?[end]

[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... I heard most of it from the people upstairs.
[character][0x1], please. Please let us be alone...[end]
Nelbo: You're [character][0x1] of Kahna's Dragon Squad, right?[end]
Nelbo: Please let them be alone.[end]
Joy: The door is open. Please go on in.[end]
Joy: They have asked to be alone for now...[end]
What will happen to Campbell now?[end]
Don't misunderstand the citizens of Campbell! We're not all slovenly people![end]
People of the freedom force... We have complicated feelings...[end]
We opposed the Empire so we were put in here.[end]
You did an unnecessary thing in driving the Empire away![end]

...Huh?
Why don't you leave? Nothing really.[end1]
The door isn't locked so I can leave anytime I want... But I was against the queen's ideas. I truly respect the queen, so I don't want to bother her. It's complicated...[end]
Good! I thought you were going to ask me something hard to explain![end]
Matelite: What? I don't care if you ARE King Kahna's sister, I still won't forgive you![end]
Queen Campbell: Matelite... You haven't changed.[end]
Matelite: Oh! If I had to change as much as you did I'd be much happier feeding dragons![end]
Taicho: Matelite! Calm down![end]
Matelite: How can I calm down when I hear something like this?![end]
Matelite: You pitiful queen of Campbell! That you are much happier being ruled by the Empire...[end]
Taicho: Excellent work! Now let us prepare to bring our plan to its fruition.[end]
Matelite: Yeah... the plan! I wanna get the hell out of this place, but I can't leave just yet![end]
Taicho: Have you calmed down.[end]
Matelite:h.. Not ye.[end][end]
